original_text: So now your family will always have people who die in battle. When you took the wife of Uriah the Hittite to be your own wife, you showed that you did not respect me.”
korean_text: 이제 네가 나를 업신여기고 헷 사람 우리아의 아내를 빼앗아 네 아내로 삼았은즉 칼이 네 집에서 영원토록 떠나지 아니하리라 하셨고

sentences.original_text: So now your family will always have people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 네 가족은 언제나 사람들이 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: When you took the wife of Uriah the Hittite
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 헷 사람 우리아의 아내를 데려갔을 때

sentences.original_text: you showed that you did not respect me
